column5: I see youtube has you pumped for this 2010 ice season...

yep....  I have been skunked so for for trout   and it's one helluva long time till bass season opens  So I am gonna try ice fishing since I keep seeing all the posts on here and can sense the pent up anticipation for it
I wish you good luck buddy! One toy to look at is "spring bobbers" as I'm going to have a look at these over the next week or so...
Ive seen this video before, but something is kind of werd with this video, how did the get to the top of the auger to start the hole?

You add extentions as you go down. You disconnect the motor unit, add a 2 foot extention, hook the motor unit back on and drill the next 2 feet. Do this 5 times and you reach bottom. They could have done the reverse when taking it out but they wanted to show you how deep the ice actually was.
Actually this is correct, extensions are used.
